page.title: 13ACTIVITIES IN LEISURE TIME
page.content: Although recreational facilities in this area are limited to one football pitch and one tennis court, people still participate in a wide variety of activities. The most popular outdoor activity we found was gardening which is appropriate in a rural community. Football would be the next most popular outdoor activity.When surveyed we found that the people had been following their particular pastime for more than five years.Indoors people occuppied themselves by watching tv,knitting,keep fit and in recent years Gymnastics especially amongst the younger generation. Those who had little leisure time were from farms or had young children. It was significant that 70% watched TV as a major pastime with an average of 4-5 hours viewing per day.
